title: tonlottery
author: tonlottery
content: website - https://tonlottery.siteAbout the projectTON Lottery is the first numerical decentralized lottery operating in the "The Open Network" network.The fundamental principles of the lottery are freedom, transparency, and honesty. These concepts are achieved by using the capabilities of smart contracts.The source code of the lottery is in the "smart contract", which is part of the TON network. It cannot be closed, deleted, or changed.A smart contract is the same wallet as everyone else, but with the ability to run algorithms. Anyone can look at all incoming or outgoing lottery transactions.The contract is completely autonomous, it does not require the participation of third parties, everything happens automatically on the TON network. Even the organizers of the project are not able to influence the result of the drawings, or withdraw funds to their wallet. The source code of the project has been verified, and anyone can also get acquainted with it.Advantages of TON Lottery:Participation from anywhere in the world, with any citizenshipFully open source project codeInstant payouts (even large jackpots)Guaranteed prize (after the jackpot draw, the next jackpot will not start from scratch)The commission for maintaining the product is only 10 percent, compared to state lotteries, whose percentage is 30-60 percentCOMPLETE anonymity. No registration, no bank cardsThe rules cannot be changed, since it is impossible to edit the source code of the productGuaranteed payouts - all winnings are sent automatically, they cannot be canceledwebsite - https://tonlottery.site

comments.body: The lottery gambling website that you offer seems very interesting and profitable for those gamblers who like lottery gambling and lottery jackpot hunters.However, do many gamblers believe and use your website so they can place lottery bets.It's possible that in this forum there are some gamblers who like to bet on lottery, but it seems not much different from those gamblers who like to play at home or street gambling.I myself don't really like lottery bets, so I haven't been able to enter and use your site to place lottery bets.Good luck on what you've been promoting.
